oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On compound Poisson approximation for sums of random variables
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: VELLAISAMY, P
CHAUDHURI, B
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sums of dependent random variables
compound poisson approximations
markov binomial distribution
limiting distributions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An upper bound for the total variation distance between the distribution of the sum of a sequence of r.v.'s and that of a compound Poisson is derived. Its applications to a general independent sequence and Markov-binomial sequence are demonstrated. (C) 1999 .
